work.summary: Provided technical support for end users, managed Windows and Apple devices, configured Microsoft 365 apps, and resolved hardware/software issues. Administered Active Directory accounts and documented support cases in a ticketing system.

certificates.name: JPMorgan Chase & Co. - Cybersecurity Job Simulation

projects.name: Home Lab Security Audit
projects.description: Conducted a security audit of home lab systems. Implemented hardening techniques, configured firewalls, and set up logging and monitoring tools like auditd and Splunk.

projects.name: SIEM Threat Detection Simulation
projects.description: Configured Splunk to detect security events using alerts and dashboards based on simulated threats from TryHackMe labs.

projects.name: Endpoint Detection & Response
projects.description: Deployed Suricata IDS/IPS and used SysInternals on Windows to investigate suspicious behavior.

projects.name: Network Forensics
projects.description: Used Wireshark and Zeek to analyze PCAP files and identify potential threats and anomalies.
